register.name: FS_HFNUM
register.description: OTG_FS host frame number/frame time remaining register (OTG_FS_HFNUM)

register.name: FS_HPTXSTS
register.description: OTG_FS_Host periodic transmit FIFO/queue status register (OTG_FS_HPTXSTS)

field.name: PTXQTOP
field.description: Top of the periodic transmit request queue

field.name: PTXQSAV
field.description: Periodic transmit request queue space available

field.name: PTXFSAVL
field.description: Periodic transmit data FIFO space available

register.name: HAINT
register.description: OTG_FS Host all channels interrupt register

register.name: HAINTMSK
register.description: OTG_FS host all channels interrupt mask register

register.name: FS_HPRT
register.description: OTG_FS host port control and status register (OTG_FS_HPRT)

register.name: FS_HCTSIZ0
register.description: OTG_FS host channel-0 transfer size register

register.name: FS_HCTSIZ1
register.description: OTG_FS host channel-1 transfer size register

register.name: FS_HCTSIZ2
register.description: OTG_FS host channel-2 transfer size register

register.name: FS_HCTSIZ3
register.description: OTG_FS host channel-3 transfer size register

register.name: FS_HCTSIZ4
register.description: OTG_FS host channel-x transfer size register

register.name: FS_HCTSIZ5
register.description: OTG_FS host channel-5 transfer size register

register.name: FS_HCTSIZ6
register.description: OTG_FS host channel-6 transfer size register

register.name: FS_HCTSIZ7
register.description: OTG_FS host channel-7 transfer size register
